description:
This mini-course covers two very important features of database systems, from
the application-builder's perspective: indexing for increased performance, and
transactions for concurrency control and failure recovery. It will be
available for an extended period of time. We anticipate the content will be
available at least until June 9th, 2015. You will be notified by email of any
changes to content availability beforehand.

We have created 14 mini-courses that can be assembled in a variety of ways to
learn about different aspects of databases. Please visit the main Databases
page for suggested pathways and general information, or click View Courseware
above to begin this mini-course.
title: Indexes and Transactions
